comment: Alternate proof of ~ 0cnALT which is shorter, but depends on ~ ax-8 , ~ ax-13 , ~ ax-sep , ~ ax-nul , ~ ax-pow , ~ ax-pr , ~ ax-un , and every complex number axiom except ~ ax-pre-mulgt0 and ~ ax-pre-sup . (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
